title: Party of Socialists of the Republic of Moldova
summary: The Party of Socialists of the Republic of Moldova (Romanian: Partidul Socialiștilor din Republica Moldova, Russian: Партия социалистов Республики Молдова, romanized: Partya sotsialistov Respubliki Moldova, PSRM) is a democratic socialist political party in Moldova.[1] A populist party,[2] it holds Eurosceptic[2] and Russophilian views,[3][4] both of which are reflected by its long-time leader[5] Igor Dodon.[6][7][8] it is contrasted to like-minded centre-left European parties for its conservative views on social issues,[9] reflecting the country's strong social conservatism and the influence of the Moldovan Orthodox Church.[10]
